First of all i want to say Star Guardians are probably Riot's best skin franchise, to me at least. They've done an amazing job and these threads are only created to help them in furthering their excellence with this franchise!

So, My main plea is that if Riot can provide us more tanks, top lane and jungle potential as Star Guardians, I think a lot of people would be really happy.

Before i give my list, i just want to say that I don't think we really need any more male star guardians. Ezreal being the only male in the group is fine, because it actually fits his character (kind of like a harem in an anime lol). The only two exceptions i'd even think about is  (Taric), and  (Rakan) ONLY if (Xayah) gets one. Historically, they have to have the same skins - but i don't see that happening honestly.

Now, here is a list of potential candidates.

 (Irelia) - as the leader, color red? (There's a link to the design concept attached created by xxsmell from twitter, found this amazing idea concept by Elinz's thread "Star Guardian Irelia (Skin Concept!)")
 (Riven) - color green?
 (Diana) - color white?
 (VI) - color pink?
 (Leona) - color yellow?
All of these are very good selections to fit as Star Guardians due to their personalities, strong will, and the roles that Star Guardians actually need currently for 2018. (We have one current tank / top laner and that's  (Poppy), so it's hard to make full star guardian teams).

Fan favorites and Runner up's are:

 (Sona) - Everyone wants Sona, hell even i do! But is she really needed? We have 3 supports already. The only reason  (Leona) gets in the list is because she's a tank support, something kind of new.
 (Zoe) - We already have 3 potential mid lane Star Guardians, but I mean come on lol, Zoe has star guardian all over her face and personality.
 (Nidalee) - Though she is a squishy jungler, she's still a jungler and her personality may fit in well as a Star Guardian.
 (Taliyah) - Brings nothing new to the roles as a mid laner, just like  , but I think she would fit well into the skin franchise.
